Text03:
Take heed, and do not rely solely upon
the power of that sword. You must steel
your mind and your spirit as well.
I am always here.<sp:5:1:0> Should you ever have
need of me, you need only ask.
Text01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Young one.<sp:5:1:0> It seems you have met with
great danger once more.

Yet I see that you carry the Master Sword.
Make good use of it.<sp:0:4:0>I am always here.<sp:5:1:0> Should you ever have
need of me, you need only ask.
Text02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_01>That sword...<sp:5:1:0> I sense a sacred power
within it that is stronger than before.
What has come to pass?
